content.rendered:
Play Blockpost Unblocked : Newest first-person Shooter Game

Blockpost free to play shooter game

Blockpost is the newest free-to-play first-person shooter game that can be played on both mobile devices and personal computers. This game is an excellent example of how the first-person shooter (FPS) genre can be seamlessly combined with cubic 3D game graphics.

Blockpost Online

You will engage in intense online firefights with other Blockpost players from around the world.

Blockpost Play Online : Select your weapon, then join the match, and you’ll never get bored playing Blockpost because this game comes with seven different game modes and over twenty different maps to choose from. In addition, Blockpost Game will provide you with the opportunity to upgrade and unlock more than one hundred distinct types of firearms. The more you play, the faster you gain levels and access to additional weapons and items. Inviting your friends to join you in the fun of this game is a great way to increase your chances of winning.

 

How to Play Blockpost

Just pick a weapon from your arsenal and jump into a match! There are seven game modes, more than 20 maps, and more than 100 types of firearms in Blockpost. You can earn coins with every match you play.

Blockpost Controls

  • To move, press the A key to move left, the D key to move right, the W key to move forward, and the S key to move backward; alternatively, you can use the up and down, left and right arrow keys.
  • Utilize the left mouse button to attack (shoot).
  • The goal is to click the right button on your mouse.
  • To perform a jump, press the spacebar (space)
  • To quickly switch weapons, press the appropriate number key on your keyboard.

Blockpost Browser in a free online shooter that mixes the gameplay of arena shooters and voxel games to create a unique FPS pixel experience.

The game is a rich cocktail consisting of the most popular and functional gaming solutions. Customization of characters, opening cases and improving the existing Arsenal — all this is available in the game now. Join the gaming community of tomorrow!

BLOCKPOST Gameplay

BLOCKPOST : Tactical shooter from the cubic game universe.

Keeping the hurricane character of the classic online FPS, the game sets a new level of gameplay, at the junction of the most popular and relevant genres, recognized by many hardcore players of different ages around the world.

Play blockpost full screen

Blockpost lands at IDC/Games with its polished pixel aesthetic that will delight fans of shooters with retro touches. The game has been developed by the Kazakhstani studio Skullcap Studios that has focused on creating a procedural cubic 3D-shooter with the best mechanics within its genre.
The game has 7 game modes that take place in totally unique maps, more than 100 different weapons.

how to get coins in blockpost

Easy-To-Earn coins, such as completing simple (really simple) tasks for 1-5 coins.
Player and gunwise, such as player-made grenade trails for 200 coins (Easy-To-Earn coins addon).

Get Gold Coins in Blockpost and upgrade guns

how to crouch in blockpost

if looking for How To Do Crouch In BlockPost Mobile watch this video guide

how to get free coins in blockpost mobile

Watch : get free coins ! No hack No mod 100% Working Trick Get 50 Coins For Free.

how to get prime status in blockpost?

in this video you learn to get prime and free coins.

how to fix crash in blockpost

is Blockpost not working or having issues for you?

Blockpost app may not be working for you due to some issues that your device may have or your internet connection problem.
It is one of the most common problem in android operating system.

Usually when you open an app, you will see a black screen for few seconds and then app will crash with or without an error message. There are few ways to fix this problem.

how do you unlock weapons in blockpost

Weapons of BLOCKPOST are different and we can organize them in several categories.
The first split is for melee weaponry and shooting weaponry. Melee contain weapons that are mainly used to destroy cubes [blocks] but are also good at short distance to kill, even with headshot. Shooting is part of weapons under 1,2 [Primary, Secondary slots] and they are to give enemies damage at short/medium/long/v.long distance.

how to get sights for guns in blockpost?

When I buy weapons, some weapons appear with sights, but when entering the game, they are without. How do I get them?
Inventory —> click a weapon —> view gun
then you choose whatever you want from what you have
pd: most guns have sight (Ex: you will ahve a starer sight with teh Scout) but the ones who doesnt have in the picture you have to get them by killing people which levels up the gun

Games Like BLOCKPOST

Procedural cubic 3D-shooter in the best traditions of the genre. The game is a rich cocktail consisting of the most popular and functional gaming solutions. Customization of characters, opening cases and improving the existing arsenal — all this is available in the game now.

Shooter Games Like BLOCKPOST
  • Super Meat Boy
  • FINAL FANTASY IV
  • The walking zombie: Dead city
  • KUBOOM
  • Death Point
  • King Of Dirt
  • Redmatch 2
  • Splitgate: Arena Warfare
  • OMFG: One Million Fatal Guns
  • Viscerafest
  • Rule No. 1
  • ARMORED HEAD
  • Due Process
  • splitgate-beta
  • Cat Warfare
  • DOOM 1993
  • Ace of Spades
  • Guncraft
  • Block Warfare: Operations
  • Miner of Duty
  • Brick Force
how to aim in blockpost

Aim for the head, headshots do double damage and can frag an opponent before they have a chance to react to you.

How do you scope in Blockpost?

Go to inventory, click on the weapon and press “View”. Every few levels you can unlock a sight. Some snipers come with it at lv 0. Some weapons have 2 sights, some have like 6.

how to craft in blockpost

build craft case : Merge 3 of the same orange (rare) items .

how to get new weapons in blockpost

If your team is using mostly the same weapon type, change yours to another for further support of your teammates. (Example: If your team is mostly using shotguns switching to a long-range weapon such as a sniper can help take out enemies with weapons with a larger range then a shotgun.)
